Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Maximize the business value by prioritizing high-priority features.

Name: maximize_sprint_story_points
Description: Maximize the amount of work (story points) completed in a sprint.

Name: minimize_total_effort
Description: Minimize the total estimated effort for all user stories to increase efficiency.

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the team's average velocity over several sprints.

Name: minimize_unresolved_blockers
Description: Minimize the number of active blockers to ensure smooth progress.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize satisfaction by focusing on features relevant to influential stakeholders.

Name: minimize_project_duration
Description: Minimize the overall project timeline from start to end.

Name: maximize_skill_coverage
Description: Maximize the number of unique certified skills available within a team.

Name: minimize_sprint_goal_failures
Description: Minimize the number of sprints that fail to meet their defined sprint goal.

Name: maximize_budget_utilization
Description: Maximize the effective use of the project budget without exceeding it.

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize the effort for individual tasks to optimize sprint workload.

Name: maximize_feature_completion_rate
Description: Maximize the number of features with status 'done' in a release plan.
